title: How can I display my NFT certificate online?
text: In addition to your NFT, you will get a PNG image with your NFT ID and the mention 'Karbon Basar', download and display freely!

title: Do your NFTs have rarity traits or anything I should know?
text: No, but such a system may be rolled out progressively. HOWEVER, each NFT is only available for ONE month only, you get one per purchase. Also, special NFTs will be offered during promotion events. Stay tuned.

title: What is ħ?
text: ħ (HBAR) is the currency we use to support our NFTs. It is based on the carbon negative Hedera Distributed Ledger (DL) network.

title: Why are you a for profit company?
text: We want to generate momentum towards ever more eficient climate action and towards eco-harmony (hence our name).

title: What are the marketplace fees?
text: All prices include a 4% fee for the payment processors and harmonia-eko.
